mapper.select: SELECT CUST_ID custId , BIZ_NAME bizName , CUST_TYPE_CODE custTypeCode , BIZ_NUM bizNum , REPLACE(BIZ_NUM_SUB, '0000' , '') bizNumSub , CEO , BIZ_COND bizCond , BIZ_KIND bizKind , BIZ_ADDR bizAddr , BIZ_POST bizPost , BIZ_ADDR_DETAIL bizAddrDetail , BIZ_TYPE_CODE bizTypeCode , BANK_CODE bankCode , BANK_CNNM bankCnnm , BANK_ACCOUNT bankAccount , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM T_CUST_DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}) deptName , #{deptId} deptId , ISNULL(OAPI_YN, 'N') oapiYn , ISNULL(OAPI_TOKEN, '') oapiToken FROM T_CUST_MST WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId}

SELECT AA.* FROM ( SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY bizName ASC) AS number
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) AS number
, AAA.* FROM ( SELECT CUST_ID custId , BIZ_NAME bizName , CUST_TYPE_CODE custTypeCode , (SELECT CNAME FROM T_CODE WHERE GCODE = 'CUST_TYPE_CD' AND CODE = CUST_TYPE_CODE) custTypeName , left(BIZ_NUM,3)+'-'+substring(BIZ_NUM,4,2)+'-'+substring(BIZ_NUM,6,len(BIZ_NUM)) bizNum , BIZ_NUM_SUB bizNumSub , CEO , BIZ_COND bizCond , BIZ_KIND bizKind , BIZ_POST bizPost , BIZ_ADDR bizAddr , BIZ_ADDR_DETAIL bizAddrDetail , REGDATE FROM T_CUST_MST
CUST_ID = #{custId}
BIZ_NAME LIKE '%' + #{bizName} + '%'
BIZ_NUM LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#{bizNum}, '-', '') + '%'
) AAA ) AA WHERE number BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY number ASC

SELECT COUNT(1) retCnt FROM T_CUST_MST
CUST_ID LIKE '%' + #{custId} + '%'
BIZ_NAME LIKE '%' + #{bizName} + '%'
BIZ_NUM LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#{bizNum}, '-', '') + '%'
